DOC.brief_summary: The study design evaluate impact novel kinematic biofeedback system - SWORD - motor performance patient stroke . The SWORD system combine inertial motion tracker mobile app , allow digitization patient motion provide real-time audiovisual biofeedback . The investigator hypothesize biofeedback feedback provide SWORD system improve patient performance , define increase number correct movement . The design study cross-over randomized clinical trial . Patients randomize two group . Both perform two separate session consist one exercise - shoulder flexion elbow flexion 90 degree - 4 minute experimental setting : without biofeedback . Group 1 perform exercise biofeedback first without biofeedback , interval > 24h . Group 2 perform exercise opposite order . The SWORD system use record movement data session , feedback active one .
